sentences.en: Choose a couple from The Taming of the Shrew or Don Quixote to discuss.
sentences.cn: 在《驯悍记》或《堂吉诃德》中选择一对男女作讨论.

sentences.en: North American shrew with tail less than half its body length.
sentences.cn: 北美洲鼩鼱,尾巴比其身体的一半还短.

sentences.en: The purification of UCP - l ( Uncoupling protein - 1 ) from BAT ( brown adipose tissue ) of the tree shrew.
sentences.cn: 中缅树?褐色脂肪组织解偶联蛋白质 -1 的纯化.

sentences.en: The shrew stands at the door and keeps shouting abuse.
sentences.cn: 那个泼妇站在门口,不停地嫚骂.
祢就是一嗰粗鲁的泼妇!

words.tran_cn: 泼妇一样的；爱骂街的；脾气暴躁的

trans.tran_en: an unpleasant woman who always argues and disagrees with people
